actions.text: Amendment SA 1808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1808 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S8025-8029; text: CR S8026) To provide to members of the Armed Forces and their families comprehensive information on benefits for members of the Armed Forces and their families.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1808 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1808 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL.

purpose: To provide to members of the Armed Forces and their families comprehensive information on benefits for members of the Armed Forces and their families.
